an4.208:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchaditthiko hoti …pe… micchanani hoti, micchavimutti hoti.
an4.208:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attana ca micchaditthiko hoti, paranca micchaditthiya samadapeti …pe… attana ca micchanani hoti, paranca micchanane samadapeti;
an4.208:3.3: attana ca micchavimutti hoti, paranca micchavimuttiya samadapeti.
an4.208:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammaditthiko hoti …pe… sammanani hoti, sammavimutti hoti.
an4.208:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attana ca sammaditthiko hoti, paranca sammaditthiya samadapeti …pe… attana ca sammanani hoti, paranca sammanane samadapeti;
an4.208:5.3: attana ca sammavimutti hoti, paranca sammavimuttiya samadapeti.
